author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATASTROPHIC, HISTORIC FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF THE SOUTHERN APPALACHIANS...
summary:
...CATASTROPHIC, HISTORIC FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF THE SOUTHERN APPALACHIANS...
 As of 10:00 PM CDT Fri Sep 27
 the center of Helene was located near 38.0, -87.0
 with movement WSW at 8 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 987 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Helene (AT4/AL092024)
